A CARBON MARKET TECH ENABLER & developer

Unlocking
Africa's Carbon Potential
for Sustainable Livelihoods

Technology enabled platform for unlocking finance, improving community governance and enhancing integrity in carbon markets

Access dMRV Platform

Key Action Areas

Verst aims to intervene in four main areas barring the scaling of African carbon markets

Pre-financing

Taking down the cost barrier through innovative climate finance solutions.

Ecosystem Integration

Bringing together all stakeholders in the carbon ecosystem to enhance cohesion, and expedite processes.

Integrity

Innovative project monitoring solutions to ensure the integrity of carbon credits.

Community

Providing a platform for the sharing of gains among community members that facilitate project development.

Verst Carbon's mission is to leverage carbon financing to deliver desired social-economic outcomes for African Communities.

CONSULTING Services
Addressing the Carbon Development Knowledge and Implementation Gap in the Continent with Our Consulting Services: Project Advisory, Project Development, and Capacity Building
Learn More

Project Advisory

Providing expert guidance and strategic insights to navigate the complexities of carbon projects, our project advisory services ensure informed decision-making at every stage.

Project Development

Our project development services encompass the entire lifecycle — from conceptualization and planning to execution developing impactful and sustainable carbon projects.

Capacity Building

We enhance capabilities. Through capacity building, we empower individuals and organizations with the skills and expertise needed for effective participation in the carbon industry.
WE UNITE STAKEHOLDERS FOR FULL-CYCLE CARBON DEVELOPMENT

Our Integrated Carbon Project Ecosystem

Project Proponents

Onboard projects and get matched to a project developers

Investors

Sign NDA’s and request access to projects seeking financing

VVB's

Receive requests for project validation and verification

DMRV Providers

Recieve requests to monitor projects digitally and  submit reports

Buyers

Purchase carbon credits in our sport or futures marketplace
